title: Sweaty Hands, Gym Straps ?
selftext:
1 month beginner in weight lifting. prior some condition of chronic excessive sweaty hands and body.

Am facing difficulty in holding pulling movement with barb, and dumb. Someone in my gym recommend me to buy gym glove,

Problem is: Am concern that If sweat would make it worse in full gym gloves, or should i go to chalk, or anyone facing same problem how did you deal with  this .
comments:
Gloves will make your grip worse in every case.

Use Chalk and learn to use the hook grip.
